name: Chicken Teriyaki
recipe:
1. Marinate chicken in teriyaki sauce for 30 minutes.
2. Cook in pan until done.
3. Serve with steamed rice and broccoli.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipe:
1. Cook spaghetti.
2. Fry pancetta until crisp.
3. Mix eggs, cheese, pepper. Combine with pasta and pancetta off heat.

name: Paella
recipe:
1. Cook chicken and chorizo in paella pan.
2. Add rice, saffron, stock, peas, prawns.
3. Simmer until rice is cooked and stock absorbed.
